Package oop.ex6.main

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.ex6.main.Block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Functions
    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    describe a scope in Sjavac: section of code that could be described as all the global members, or specific method, or inner scope such as if or while section.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected boolean isGlobal
      ids the global block, default is false
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Variable> variableMap
      all the oop.ex6.variables in the block

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Block​(Block previousBlock)
      create new block so if there is no pointer to previous block, it would set it as global scope.

      • isVariableInBlock

        public Variable isVariableInBlock​(java.lang.String variableName)
        checks if a variable in this block or exists and initialized in global scope.
        Parameters:
        variableName - the name of the variable.
        Returns:
        the Variable object if found one, else would return null

      • updateMap

        public void updateMap()
        shallow copy the previous block map of all the oop.ex6.variables that were initialized, and overwrite the oop.ex6.variables the were not initialized.
